nodes.long_description: Embark on a journey of serenity with Zen Garden VR! Step into our virtual realm and immerse yourself in the captivating beauty of Japanese-inspired landscapes. From the majestic pagodas to the iconic Tori Gates, every corner invites you to explore and discover tranquility like never before. 🌸✨ Let the gentle rustle of leaves and the soft murmur of the wind guide you to inner peace in this digital oasis. Whether you seek a moment of relaxation or a path to mindfulness, Zen Garden VR offers a sanctuary for the soul. #ZenGardenVR #VirtualRelaxation #JapaneseSerenity 🌿🌸
nodes.short_description: Step into tranquility with Zen Garden VR! Immerse yourself in serene Japanese inspired landscapes, from pagodas, and Tori Gates, to discovering inner peace in this VR digital oasis. 🌸✨ #ZenGardenVR #VirtualRelaxation #JapaneseSerenity 🎋🏯

nodes.change_log:
Zen Garden VR - Release Notes
Version 1.1.5 - New Scene & Meditation Updates
New Features & Enhancements

New Scene: "Magical Mist"

A new immersive environment has been added to Zen Garden VR. The Magical Mist scene introduces a serene, fog-covered landscape designed to enhance relaxation and mindfulness.

New Meditation Voiceovers

Two new meditation voiceovers are now available, providing guided relaxation for different times of the day. These voiceovers are included in the following scenes:

    Day Scene – A revitalizing meditation to start your day with clarity and focus.

    Night Scene – A calming meditation to help unwind and prepare for restful sleep.

Magical Mist Scene – A specially crafted meditation designed to complement the tranquil, misty atmosphere.

Experience deeper relaxation and mindfulness with these new additions to Zen Garden VR.

Zen Garden VR - Latest Update�Release Notes

Welcome, weary travelers, to the garden.

Step into a world of tranquility, where every detail is designed to soothe the soul and spark creativity. 

Here’s what’s new in your journey to peace:

New Features:
	
•	Customizable Atmospheres: Shape your sanctuary. Choose from serene sunsets or a moonlit night, each accompanied by calming ambient sounds tailored to your mood. Use the garden for multi tasking, find your spot, chill and open up a web browser.
	
•	Guided Meditation Mode: Follow a soothing voice as it leads you through mindful breathing and relaxation exercises, synced with the garden’s environment.

Visual Enhancements:
	
•	Lush Landscapes: Every tree, stone, and grass blade has been refined for greater detail and vibrancy, immersing you deeper into the beauty of the garden.
	
•	Dynamic Lighting: Magical fog has emerged from the mountains naturally with the time of day, creating a more magical and serene experience.

Quality Improvements:
	•	Smooth Transitions: Moving between garden areas takes a moment from the dropdown menu. Please wait for the scene to load.
	•	Performance Upgrades: Under-the-hood optimizations ensure a smoother, more stable experience across all devices.
Your journey into Zen Garden VR is ever-evolving, and we’re committed to making this sanctuary your ultimate escape.
Take a deep breath, traveler. The garden awaits.

Release Notes for Zen Garden VR

Dear Weary Travelers,

Before stepping into this tranquil world, please ensure your field of view is centered, and your guardian boundaries are properly set.

Once inside, take a moment to reset your view once more for the most immersive and harmonious experience. Your journey to serenity begins with preparation.

What’s New in This Update:

Video Intro:
A video plays before the app starts to remind you to centre your view with the Oculus button.

Bug Fixes: Tori Gates are now more centred, walking speed has increased.

The Pagoda Awaits: The once-closed pagoda doors have now opened, welcoming you into its peaceful embrace. Sit by the cosy fire, feel its warmth, and let its gentle glow soothe your spirit.

Day and Night Modes: The Zen Garden now transforms with the passage of time. Bask in the golden hues of the day or let the stillness of the night embrace you under a blanket of stars. Your sanctuary evolves with your mood.

More Scenes Coming Soon: The journey doesn’t end here. New landscapes and meditative experiences are on their way to enrich your escape to tranquility.

Remember, traveler, this is your space to unwind, reflect, and reconnect with the stillness within. Let the whispers of the wind and the crackle of the fire guide you to your Zen.

With Love

K - Zen Garden VR
